update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: Data collection interval, measured in seconds.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The timeout in seconds for the HTTP request.

not_follow_redirects.title: Not follow redirects
not_follow_redirects.description: If set, the client will not follow HTTP redirects automatically.

per_server_stats.title: Server selector
per_server_stats.description: Configures collection of per-server statistics. If left empty, no stats will be collected. Matching is performed against the `server` label value.

includes.title: Include
includes.description: Include servers whose names match any of the specified inclusion [patterns](https://github.com/netdata/netdata/tree/master/src/go/collectors/go.d.plugin/pkg/matcher#readme).

excludes.title: Exclude
excludes.description: Exclude servers whose names match any of the specified exclusion [patterns](https://github.com/netdata/netdata/tree/master/src/go/collectors/go.d.plugin/pkg/matcher#readme).

per_zone_stats.title: Zone selector
per_zone_stats.description: Configures collection of per-zone statistics. If left empty, no stats will be collected. Matching is performed against the `zone` label value.

includes.title: Include
includes.description: Include zones whose names match any of the specified inclusion [patterns](https://github.com/netdata/netdata/tree/master/src/go/collectors/go.d.plugin/pkg/matcher#readme).

excludes.title: Exclude
excludes.description: Exclude zones whose names match any of the specified exclusion [patterns](https://github.com/netdata/netdata/tree/master/src/go/collectors/go.d.plugin/pkg/matcher#readme).

proxy_url.title: Proxy URL
proxy_url.description: The URL of the proxy server.

headers.title: Headers
headers.description: Additional HTTP headers to include in the request.

tls_skip_verify.title: Skip TLS verification
tls_skip_verify.description: If set, TLS certificate verification will be skipped.

tls_ca.title: TLS CA
tls_ca.description: The path to the CA certificate file for TLS verification.

tls_cert.title: TLS certificate
tls_cert.description: The path to the client certificate file for TLS authentication.

tls_key.title: TLS key
tls_key.description: The path to the client key file for TLS authentication.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).

per_server_stats.ui:help: The logic for inclusion and exclusion is as follows: `(include1 OR include2) AND !(exclude1 OR exclude2)`.

per_zone_stats.ui:help: The logic for inclusion and exclusion is as follows: `(include1 OR include2) AND !(exclude1 OR exclude2)`.
